title: Construction Indonesia 2025: A Hub for Sustainable and Innovative Building Solutions
body: Construction Indonesia 2025, marking its 25th anniversary, will focus on sustainable and innovative building materials and technology, expanding its scope to include commercial and residential buildings alongside infrastructure. The event, held from September 10-13, 2025, at Jakarta International Expo, aims to foster collaboration among industry players and promote cutting-edge practices in construction, with significant participation from companies like Bunka Pancakarya and BMB Steel.

title: International Industrial Week Indonesia 2025: A Platform for Industry Collaboration and Growth
body: PT. Meorient Exhibition International is hosting a series of pre-exhibition events for the International Industrial Week Indonesia 2025, focusing on industry networking and business opportunities in manufacturing and logistics. Key industry stakeholders, including the Indonesian Packaging Federation and the Indonesian Logistics Association, emphasize the event's potential for fostering collaboration and accessing high-quality suppliers.
